channel.title: Quest turning yellow then green
channel.description: hey guys. I made a quest but i need help. you can click the quest and see what you need to do but it doesnt turn yellow when you accept the quest and doesn't turn green when you finish the quest. Help please? (Quest is Cook's assistant)

item.title: Quest turning yellow then green
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

if(c.cookAss == 0) { sendFrame126("@red@Cook's Assistant", ####); } else if(c.cookAss == 3) { sendFrame126("@gre@Cook's Assistant", ####); } else { sendFrame126("@yel@Cook's Assistant", ####); } }

Read full topic
